name: Shatter (itch)
description:
*Please note that there is only one ending, so no, you didn't get a 'bad end'.

**WASD, Space bar, Enter, ESC

*** It might be difficult, but please try to talk to all of the 'characters' with space bar or enter

**** Created for RPG Maker Jam 2

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fae recruits Zen to go on a journey with her.
